long_description: Compliant with Transportation Security Administration (TSA) regulations, the 6-piece Nalgene Travel bottle kit makes it easy to bring along your own shampoo, conditioner, soap and pills when flying. Includes1 pill vial and 5 leakproof screw-top bottles for storing liquids and gels; bottles can also store food items, such as sauces and spices, when you're camping. Color-coded caps on the screw-top bottles allow for easy identification. All bottles are smaller than 3 fl. oz. to meet TSA regulations for carry-on items. Bottles come in a handy translucent zippered case that you can send through the security checkpoint at the airport.
short_description: Compliant with Transportation Security Administration (TSA) regulations, the 6-piece Nalgene Travel bottle kit makes it easy to bring along your own shampoo, conditioner, soap and pills when flying.
